c74object.name: mlmat.kmeans
c74object.description: K means clustering. An implementation of several strategies for efficient k-means clustering. Given a dataset and a value of k, this computes and returns a k-means.

attribute.name: percentage
attribute.digest: Percentage of dataset to use for each refined start sampling (use when refined_start is specified)
attribute.description: Percentage of dataset to use for each refined start sampling (use when refined_start is specified). (default = 0.02)

attribute.name: samplings
attribute.digest: Number of samplings to perform for refined start (use when refined_start is specified)
attribute.description: Number of samplings to perform for refined start (use when refined_start is specified). (default = 100)

attribute.name: reuse_centroids
attribute.digest: Use previous calculated centroids for current clustering
attribute.description: Use previous calculated centroids for current clustering. (default = 0)

attribute.name: max_iterations
attribute.digest: Maximum number of iterations before k-means terminates
attribute.description: Maximum number of iterations before k-means terminates. (default = 1000)

attribute.name: seed
attribute.digest: Random seed if random basis being used
attribute.description: Random seed if random basis being used. 0 indicates no seed. (default = 0)

attribute.name: reuse_assignments
attribute.digest: Use previous assignments for current clustering
attribute.description: Use previous assignments for current clustering. If both reuse_centroids and reuse_assignments are 1, reuse_assignments overrides. (default = 0)

attribute.name: algorithm
attribute.digest: Algorithm to use for the Lloyd iteration
attribute.description: Algorithm to use for the Lloyd iteration. (default = naive)

attribute.name: allow_empty_clusters
attribute.digest: Allow empty clusters to be persist
attribute.description: Allow empty clusters to be persist. (default = 0)

attribute.name: refined_start
attribute.digest: Use refined start sampling to partition data
attribute.description: Use refined start sampling to partition data. (default = 0)
